name: advglue-mnli-adv
description: Adversarially perturbed. MNLI consists is a crowd- sourced collection of sentence pairs with textual entailment annotations. Given a premise sentence and a hypothesis sentence, the task is to predict whether the premise entails the hypothesis. This dataset consists of matched examples.
